page.title: 09EDUCATION
page.content: Some examples of these courses are: {Full_time: }Diploma of the Institute of Bankers in Scotland. Diploma for Graduate Secretaries.{Part_time:} Y.T.S. for Hairdressing. Course in Science Laboratory Technology. { {Night_classes: }almost anything. There are approximately two hundred staff at the College. One hunded and thirty of which are full-time teachers and seventy non-teaching. The number of students varies every year. Last year there was a total of one thousand six hundred full-time equivalents, this year the figure has risen by fifty. The {Technical College}was built in the 1970's, some of the new facilities are 10 years' old. There are about 150 rooms in the college which are well equiped to suit students needs.
